trans-unit.source: A generic carrier file is included in the module. It can also be used as a basis to create your own sub-module.
trans-unit.target: 一般的なキャリアファイルがモジュールに含まれています。これは、独自のサブモジュールを作成するための基礎として使用することもできます。
ベースデリバリーキャリアファイル

trans-unit.source: Base module for creation of carrier files (La Poste, TNT Express Shipper, …). Files are exported as text (csv, …). It contains : - the base structure to handle the export of files on Delivery Orders - an API to ease the generation of the files for the developers in sub-modules.
trans-unit.target: Base module for creation of carrier files (La Poste, TNT Express Shipper, …). Files are exported as text (csv, …). It contains : - the base structure to handle the export of files on Delivery Orders - an API to ease the generation of the files for the developers in sub-modules.

trans-unit.source: Make your own ! Look at the code of the modules above, it’s trivial to create a sub-module for a carrier.
trans-unit.target: Make your own ! Look at the code of the modules above, it’s trivial to create a sub-module for a carrier.

trans-unit.source: Sub-modules already exist to generate file according to specs of :
trans-unit.target: の仕様に従ってファイルを生成するためのサブモジュールが既に存在しています。

trans-unit.source: The delivery orders can be grouped in one files or be exported each one in a separate file. The files can be generated automatically on the shipment of a Delivery Order or from a manual action. They are exported to a defined path or in a document directory of your choice if the “document” module is installed.
trans-unit.target: The delivery orders can be grouped in one files or be exported each one in a separate file. The files can be generated automatically on the shipment of a Delivery Order or from a manual action. They are exported to a defined path or in a document directory of your choice if the “document” module is installed.
